1370: Ricmoden moved to Die Coninc straet.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Philips at age 16 in 1370.
Gave birth to Ghisebrecht in 1370 at age 16.
1373: Gave birth to Alard in 1373 at age 19.
1374: Gave birth to Betten in 1374 at age 20.
1376: Gave birth to Menoldis in 1376 at age 22.
1377: Gave birth to Albertus in 1377 at age 23.
1379: Gave birth to Siwa in 1379 at age 25.
1382: Gave birth to Geile in 1382 at age 28.
1384: Gave birth to Lutghardis in 1384 at age 30.
Lost son Ghisebrecht when Ghisebrecht was 15 years old.
1387: Gave birth to Margareta in 1387 at age 33.
1391: Lost daughter Menoldis when Menoldis was 16 years old.
Lost son Albertus when Albertus was 15 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1398: Lost son Betten when Betten was 25 years old.
Took grandchild Helyana in when Helyana was 2.
Took grandchild Mattheus in when Mattheus was 1.
